Flow.description: When a SOT User is created or updated, this flow will assign the TimeZoneSidKey based on the Home Site and will create an Assigned Site for the Home Site if one doesn't already exist.
Flow.interviewLabel: VCC SOT Assign TimeZoneSidKey and Assigned Site {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: VCC SOT Assign TimeZoneSidKey and Assigned Site
